item.title: Reese Witherspoon Says Women Need to Be ‘Involved in AI’ Because It’s the ‘Future of Filmmaking’: ‘You Can Lament It All You Want, but the Change Is Here’
item.description: Reese Witherspoon is welcoming the AI revolution in Hollywood and calling on the industry to make sure women are involved in the change. Speaking to Glamour magazine to promote the upcoming fourth sea

item.title: ‘The Morning Show’ Heads Into a Risky “Reset” in Steamy Season 4 Trailer
item.description: There’s lots of tension — professional and otherwise — in the latest preview for the Apple series starring Jennifer Aniston and Reese Witherspoon, which is set to return Sept. 17.
